# AVCaptureDevice.Position.front

**Case**

A position on the user-facing side of an iOS device.

## Declaration

```swift
case front
```

## Positions

- **AVCaptureDevice.Position.back**: A position on the subject-facing side of an iOS device.
- **AVCaptureDevice.Position.unspecified**: A position that’s unspecified.
